goals__remit:
Promote the Interest of the Irish Feed Industry ( compunders, importers of  feed materials &  premix companies  to the Irish and EU  Institutions. 
 
Ensure  continued  access to feed materials  by lobbying for and  promoting well functioning regulatory systems in relation to market access and phytosanitary issues .  
 
promote and encourage best practice systems  among members for the production of safe feed.  
Represent the Irish feed industry on Irish and EU funded research projects.
